name: pad-ws
description: Pad.ws is a self-hosted collaborative Markdown note editor inspired by Etherpad. It supports real-time editing, sharing, and document versioning with a minimalist interface.
features: Real-time collaboration: Multiple users edit the same Markdown document simultaneously with live cursor tracking and instant synchronization across all connected clients.
Markdown editing: Native Markdown support with syntax highlighting and live preview makes it easy to format documents while writing.
Version history: Automatic version tracking allows you to review changes over time and restore previous document states when needed.
Shareable links: Generate unique URLs for each document to share with collaborators, enabling quick access without account requirements.
Minimalist interface: Clean, distraction-free editor focused on writing and collaboration without unnecessary UI elements.
Export formats: Download documents in multiple formats including Markdown, HTML, and plain text for use in other applications.
No registration: Start editing immediately without creating accounts, reducing friction for quick collaborative sessions.
Self-hosted privacy: Full control over your data with self-hosted deployment ensures documents remain on your infrastructure.
